# RecognizedItem.Text

**Structure**

An object that represents a text item that the scanner recognizes.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Text
```

## Getting text strings

- **transcript**: The string that the text item represents.

## Locating text

- **bounds**: The bounds of the recognized item in view coordinates.
- **observation**: An object that contains details about the location and content of text and glyphs in an image.

## Identifying text

- **id**: A unique identifier for the recognized item.

## Text items

- **RecognizedItem.text(_:)**: Text or data the analyzer detects in text.

## Conforms To

- Identifiable

items.description: The string that the text item represents.
items.name: transcript

items.description: The bounds of the recognized item in view coordinates.
items.name: bounds
